Simulate fake commercial CPUE data for examples and testing

Source: R/cpue-index.R
sim_cpue.Rd

Simulate fake commercial CPUE data for examples and testing

sim_cpue(cv = 0.3, n_samples = 20, n_years = 15, n_vessels = 8)

Arguments

cv

The CV for the positive timeseries.
n_samples

The number of samples or fishing events per vessel per year.
n_years

The number of years.
n_vessels

The number of the vessels.

Examples

sim_cpue()
#> # A tibble: 2,400 x 9
#>    year_factor vessel vessel_effect year_effect pos_catch spp_catch hours_fished
#>    <fct>       <fct>          <dbl>       <dbl>     <int>     <dbl>        <dbl>
#>  1 1996        100             1.09       1.10          1      6.33            1
#>  2 1997        100             1.09       2.05          1     22.7             1
#>  3 1998        100             1.09      -0.404         1      1.50            1
#>  4 1999        100             1.09      -0.412         0      0               1
#>  5 2000        100             1.09      -0.310         1      2.26            1
#>  6 2001        100             1.09       0.721         1      5.26            1
#>  7 2002        100             1.09       1.78          1     16.8             1
#>  8 2003        100             1.09       0.423         1      4.68            1
#>  9 2004        100             1.09      -0.318         1      1.48            1
#> 10 2005        100             1.09       0.308         1      4.08            1
#> # … with 2,390 more rows, and 2 more variables: cpue <dbl>, year <dbl>
